description: Spiritual in Bryant, AR. Alcoa Family Chiropractic & Wellness is your local Chiropractor in Bryant serving all of your needs. Call us today at 501-778-2121 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
